com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Class PosTagSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTagSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PosTagSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    A tag set to be used for pos tagging. The default format for reading a PosTagSet from a file is as follows:

    All lines starting with # are ignored. The first line read is the PosTagSet name. The second line read is the PosTagSet locale.

    All further lines are postags, in a tab delimited format shown below: 

     PosTag description PosTagOpenClassIndicator

    For example: 

     # Example of a PosTagSet file
 Talismane 2013
 fr
 ADJ  adjectif  OPEN
 ADV  adverbe OPEN
 ADVWH  adverbe int√©rrogatif CLOSED
 CC conjonction de coordination CLOSED
 PONCT  ponctuation PUNCTUATION
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
    See Also:
    PosTag, PosTagOpenClassIndicator, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PosTagSet

        public PosTagSet(java.io.File file)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a PosTagSet from a file or list of strings. The file has the following format:
        First row: PosTagSet name
        Second row: PosTagSet ISO 2 letter language code
        Remaining rows:
        PosTagCode tab description tab OPEN/CLOSED
        e.g.
        ADJ adjectif OPEN
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • PosTagSet

        public PosTagSet(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Same as getPosTageSet(file), but replaces file with a scanner.

      • PosTagSet

        public PosTagSet(java.util.List<java.lang.String> descriptors)
        Same as getPosTagSet(File), but replaces the file with a List of Strings.
